@Legoche:
  1. When you were little, what did you want to be?
  2. What's the most heart warming thing you've experienced?
  3. If you had the option of adopting a baby fox or a baby koala, which one would you choose?

replies.body:
I used to get pretty annoyed very easily (still do sometimes :P) so yeah 'ImRaging' kind of fitted.

I think I can hold sky bridge well, so I contribute there I guess. I think the fact that we are all just really good friends helps to coordinate well and have some fun at the same time ;)

Rendezvous CTW is my favourite in the rotations, but I'm really hyped for Eric's new TDM map.

Least favourite would have to be Winters Day, it's pretty small and I'm clumsy so I fall into the void alot xP.

Back when I first retired I thought you were kind of cocky and overconfident person. I didn't know you at all, so this opinion was for sure completely incorrect and just based off of what kind of person I thought you might be. But now that I've talked to you a little in slack and shared our Rooney memes, I think that you're an incredibly nice person who seems to be very knowledgeable.

Then get your kangaroo tails in your back shed (we all know it's true Dan) dip them into the mixture and bite the end of the tail off. Swallow the end of the tail. Bring the rest of the tail and a donkey's eye back to the mixture, crush and blend into fine pieces. Then repeat the crush and blend of the donkey's eye and kangaroo tail. Listen to 'Dis calls for a muzz' 23 times, drink 3 shots of turkey's urine mixed with 12 and 1/4 shots of tequila. Go back to your dongaroo mixture and mix with the rest of the original concoction and boil for 32 hours.

And there you have your cure...





...or you could see a therapist your choice.

reply_to.body:
I used to get pretty annoyed very easily (still do sometimes :P) so yeah 'ImRaging' kind of fitted.

I think I can hold sky bridge well, so I contribute there I guess. I think the fact that we are all just really good friends helps to coordinate well and have some fun at the same time ;)

Rendezvous CTW is my favourite in the rotations, but I'm really hyped for Eric's new TDM map.

Least favourite would have to be Winters Day, it's pretty small and I'm clumsy so I fall into the void alot xP.

Back when I first retired I thought you were kind of cocky and overconfident person. I didn't know you at all, so this opinion was for sure completely incorrect and just based off of what kind of person I thought you might be. But now that I've talked to you a little in slack and shared our Rooney memes, I think that you're an incredibly nice person who seems to be very knowledgeable.

replies.body:
Really nice and one of the people that I struggle besting at KBWars xP 

Its near impossible with aussie (or singapore blah) ping to out pvp alot of good pvpers. But since you have latency, really make sure you time that w-tap. Also, if you have someone in a combo, stop walking forwards for a split second (by either letting go of w for longer or by pressing s) and then walk forward and repeat.

To be honest, I have no idea what I'd like to do when I'm older. Competing at taekwondo at the Olympics is a life long dream but I'd have to switch styles blah blah blah lots of complicated stuff. Other than that I'm not sure what I want to go into.
